questions.question: Which HTML tag is used to create a hyperlink?
questions.explanation: (anchor) tag is used to create hyperlinks: text

questions.question: What does CSS stand for?
questions.explanation: CSS stands for Cascading Style Sheets.

questions.question: Which CSS property changes text color?
questions.explanation: color property sets the color of text.

questions.question: What is the largest heading tag?
questions.explanation: <h1> is the largest heading, <h6> is smallest.

questions.question: Which CSS property makes text bold?
questions.explanation: font-weight property makes text bold: font-weight: bold

questions.question: How to link external CSS file?
questions.explanation: <link rel='stylesheet' href='style.css'> links external CSS file.

questions.question: Which attribute provides alternate text for images?
questions.explanation: alt attribute provides alternative text when image can't be displayed.

questions.question: What does CSS box model consist of?
questions.explanation: Box model: content (innermost), padding, border, margin (outermost).

questions.question: Which tag creates a line break?
questions.explanation: tag creates a line break (new line).

questions.question: What is the purpose of CSS margin?
questions.explanation: margin creates space outside element's border.

questions.question: Which tag is used for unordered list?
questions.explanation: <ul> creates unordered (bulleted) list.

questions.question: What does CSS position: absolute do?
options: Positioned relative to nearest positioned ancestor
questions.explanation: position: absolute positions element relative to nearest positioned ancestor.

questions.question: Which CSS property centers text?
questions.explanation: text-align: center centers text horizontally.

questions.question: What is a div tag?
questions.explanation: <div> is block-level container used for layout.

questions.question: Which property changes background color?
questions.explanation: background-color property sets background color: background-color: red

questions.question: What does CSS z-index do?
questions.explanation: z-index controls stacking order of positioned elements.

questions.question: Which tag creates a paragraph?
questions.explanation: tag creates a paragraph.

questions.question: What is the difference between class and id?
options: id is unique, class can be reused
questions.explanation: id is unique identifier, class can be used multiple times.

questions.question: Which CSS property makes element display inline?
questions.explanation: display: inline makes element inline (takes only needed width).

questions.question: What does CSS float do?
questions.explanation: float positions element to left or right of container.
